00014 #include <qcheckbox.h>
00015 #include <qstatusbar.h>

00017 #include "analyzer.h"
00018 #include "signalgenerator.h"
00019 #include "forms/signalgeneratorform.h"
00020 
00021 XSG::XSG(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00026     : XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00027       m_freq(create<XDoubleNode>("Freq", true, "%.13g")),
00028       m_oLevel(create<XDoubleNode>("OutputLevel", true)),
00029       m_fmON(create<XBoolNode>("FMON", true)),
00030       m_amON(create<XBoolNode>("AMON", true)),
00031       m_form(new FrmSG(g_pFrmMain))
00032 {
00033     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00034     m_form->setCaption(KAME::i18n("Signal Gen. Control - ") + getLabel() );
00035 
00036     m_conOLevel = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_oLevel, m_form->m_edOLevel);
00037     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freq, m_form->m_edFreq);
00038     m_conAMON = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_amON, m_form->m_ckbAMON);
00039     m_conFMON = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_fmON, m_form->m_ckbFMON);
00040       
00041     oLevel()->setUIEnabled(false);
00042     freq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00043     amON()->setUIEnabled(false);
00044     fmON()->setUIEnabled(false);
00045 }
00046 void
00047 XSG::showForms()
00048 {
00049     m_form->show();
00050     m_form->raise();
00051 }
00052 
00053 void
00054 XSG::start()
00055 {
00056     m_oLevel->setUIEnabled(true);
00057     m_freq->setUIEnabled(true);
00058     m_amON->setUIEnabled(true);
00059     m_fmON->setUIEnabled(true);
00060     
00061     m_lsnOLevel = oLevel()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00062         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onOLevelChanged);
00063     m_lsnAMON = amON()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00064         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onAMONChanged);
00065     m_lsnFMON = fmON()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00066         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onFMONChanged);
00067     m_lsnFreq = freq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00068         shared_from_this(), &XSG::onFreqChanged);
00069 }
00070 void
00071 XSG::stop()
00072 {        
00073     m_oLevel->setUIEnabled(false);
00074     m_freq->setUIEnabled(false);
00075     m_amON->setUIEnabled(false);
00076     m_fmON->setUIEnabled(false);
00077     
00078     m_lsnOLevel.reset();
00079     m_lsnAMON.reset();
00080     m_lsnFMON.reset();
00081     m_lsnFreq.reset();
00082 
00083     afterStop();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void
00087 XSG::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00088 {
00089     m_freqRecorded = pop<double>();
00090 }
00091 void
00092 XSG::visualize()
00093 {
00094     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00095     //! record is read-locked
00096 }
00097 void
00098 XSG::onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00099 {
00100     double _freq = *freq();
00101     if(_freq <= 0) {
00102         gErrPrint(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Positive Value Needed."));
00103         return;
00104     }
00105     XTime time_awared(XTime::now());
00106     changeFreq(_freq);
00107     clearRaw();
00108     push(_freq);
00109     finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00110 }
